description.narrative: Output 6.2: Key national institutions have capacity in M&E and research and generate quality evidence on vulnerabilities and disparities, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 6. SOCIAL INCLUSIONNATIONAL INSTITUTIONS IMPLEMENT CHILD FOCUSED SOCIAL POLICY AND PROTECTION WITH EVIDENCE FOR EQUITY

title.narrative: Output 6.2: Key national institutions have capacity in M&E and research and generate quality evidence on vulnerabilities anddisparities

description.narrative: Government's counterparts, such as Department of Statistics and Ministry of Water and Infrastructure, improved their evidence-based decision making capacity through UNICEF Jordan's support, including capacity building and evidence generation to inform about the programmes and situation in Jordan, including Syrian refugee children and women. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of Governmental entities that provide data with necessary disaggregation on the situation of children and young people, in line with Jordan

baseline.value: Selected governmental entities with no existent M&E system
